description: State of Colorado Governors Office of Information Technology (OIT) Standard defining acceptable use of State information technology resources controlled and defined via authorized process and policy definition. This includes standards for the use of personal technology assets employees or may use in the execution of state-related business activities. This document is dedicated to in defining the  secure, efficient, and effective management of information technology resources withint the state environment.

name: OIT Standards - Acceptable Use of State and Personal Assets
